name: Gardn' Race
description:
Can you take the road less drifted by?

Two roads diverged in a green wood, but only one of them was gnarly enough for a good drift! With bumps and curves along the way, beating the highscore takes great vigilance! Unlock the secret driver less played by, and see if it makes all the difference!

CONTROLS:
Steer - WD/Arrows
Accelarate - Space

WATCH HOW THIS GAME WAS MADE HERE!
